data.name: Trigon: Space Story - Deluxe DLC
data.detailed_description:
Delve deeper into the galaxy and discover its secrets! The Deluxe DLC grants you insights into the making of Trigon: Space Story while you listen to the sounds of your latest space adventure.

The Deluxe DLC contains:

• Original soundtrack (23 tracks)
• Digital artbook
